title: Bug 124777Set blank tooltip in chart title will cause exception when preview.
description: Description:Set blank tooltip in chart title will cause exception when preview.Steps to reproduce:1. New a simple chart2. Add title interactivity: mouse over/show tooltip, keep tooltip text blank and click Add button.3. Preview the chart in viewer and move mouse over the chart title.Expected result:Nothing happen.Actual result:Unexpected exception dialog poped up.
